org.grouplens.lenskit.inject

Class RecommenderGraphBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.RecommenderGraphBuilder

  • public class RecommenderGraphBuilder
extends Object

    Build recommender graphs. You probably don’t want to use this class.

    Since:
    2.1
    Compatibility
    private

    • Method Detail

      • setClassLoader

        public void setClassLoader(ClassLoader loader)

      • addBindings

        public RecommenderGraphBuilder addBindings(BindingFunctionBuilder bld)

        Add bindings to the graph builder. Bindings added to this builder are processed in the reverse order as DependencySolverBuilder - add the most important bindings last.

        Parameters:
        bld - A builder of the bindings to add.
        Returns:
        The graph builder.

      • addRoots

        public RecommenderGraphBuilder addRoots(Iterable<Class<?>> classes)

        Add roots to the graph builder.

        Parameters:
        classes - Root types for the graph.
        Returns:
        The graph builder (for chaining).

      • addConfiguration

        public RecommenderGraphBuilder addConfiguration(LenskitConfiguration config)

        Add a recommender configuration.

        Parameters:
        config - The configuration.
        Returns:
        The graph builder (for chaining).

      • buildDependencySolver

        public DependencySolver buildDependencySolver()

        Build a dependency solver from the provided bindings.

        Returns:
        The dependency solver.

      • buildDependencyUnsolver

        public DependencySolver buildDependencyUnsolver()

        Build a dependency ‘unsolver’ from the provided bindings. The resulting solver, when rewriting a graph, will replace bound targets with placeholders.

        Returns:
        The dependency solver.

      • buildDependencySolverImpl

        public DependencySolver buildDependencySolverImpl(org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.RecommenderGraphBuilder.SolveDirection direction)

      • buildGraph

        public DAGNode<Component,Dependency> buildGraph()
                                         throws ResolutionException
        Throws:
        ResolutionException
